quotes.quote: Doubt 'til thou canst doubt no more...doubt is thought and thought is life. Systems which end doubt are devices for drugging thought.
quotes.author: Albert Guerard

quotes.quote: There are two ways to slide easily through life; to believe everything or to doubt everything. Both ways save us from thinking.
quotes.author: Alfred Korzybski

quotes.quote: A mind troubled by doubt cannot focus on the course to victory.
quotes.author: Arthur Golden

quotes.quote: I think we ought always to entertain our opinions with some measure of doubt. I shouldn't wish people dogmatically to believe any philosophy, not even mine.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, but wiser people so full of doubts.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Doubt whom you will, but never yourself.
quotes.author: Christine Bovee

quotes.quote: Just think of the tragedy of teaching children not to doubt.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: To have doubted one's own first principles is the mark of a civilized man.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quotes.quote: Beliefs are what divide people. Doubt unites them.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: If you would be a real seeker after truth, it is necessary that at least once in your life you doubt, as far as possible, all things.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: I show you doubt, to prove that faith exists.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: To believe with certainty we must begin with doubting.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Leszczynski

quotes.quote: Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is absurd.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote:
Our doubts are traitors,
And make us lose the good we oft might win
By fearing to attempt.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I respect faith, but doubt is what gets you an education.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner
